document.title: Books I'm reading
document.description: I like to read. Here are some of the books I've read.

body.raw:
## Currently Reading

- Die with Zero - Bill Perkins
- The Courage to Be Disliked - Ichiro Kishimi

## 2025

- Going Nuclear - Tim Gregory
- The Comfort Crisis - Michael Easter
- Golden Son - Pierce Brown
- Everything Is Tuberculosis - John Green
- To Shake the Sleeping Self - Jedidiah Jenkins
- The Housemaid - Freida McFadden
- Wild New World - Dan Flores
- Revenge of the Tipping Point - Malcolm Gladwell
- Nexus - Yuval Noah Harari
- The Andromeda Strain - Michael Crichton
- Agnostic - Lesley Hazleton
- Uglies - Scott Westerfeld
- Foundation - Isaac Asimov
- Why Buddhism is True - Robert Wright


## 2024

- Death's End - Cixin Liu
- The Obstacle Is the Way - Ryan Holiday
- Radical Acceptance - Tara Brach
- The Catcher in the Rye - J. D. Salinger
- Speaker for the Dead - Orson Scott Card
- The Dark Forest - Cixin Liu
- Airframe - Michael Crichton
- The Giver - Lois Lowry
- The Guest List - Lucy Foley
- Unit X - Raj M. Shah, Christopher Kirchhoff
- The Immortal Life of Henrietta Lacks - Rebecca Skloot
- I'll Be Gone in the Dark - Michelle McNamara
- The Book-Makers - Adam Smyth
- Dune Messiah - Frank Herbert
- The Dawn of Everything - David Graeber, David Wengrow
- Challenger - Adam Higginbotham
- Elon Musk - Walter Isaacson
- Homo Deus - Yuval Noah Harari
- How to Make a Spaceship - Julian Guthrie

## 2023
- The Emerald Mile - Kevin Fedarko
- 101 Essays That Will Change the Way You Think - Brianna Wiest
- Programmable Planet - Ted Anton
- Pines - Blake Crouch
- A Game of Thrones - George R. R. Martin
- Astrophysics for People in a Hurry - Neil deGrasse Tyson
- The Devil in the White City - Erik Larson
- The Body - Bill Bryson

document.title: Hello, new site
document.summary: Kicking off a simpler personal site focused on writing.
document.imageAlt: Coffee and laptop on a table

body.raw:
This is a sample post written in MDX. Replace this with your thoughts.

```ts
export const focus = "content-first";
```

Add images via the `image` frontmatter above. They will render as the hero at the top of the post and on the listing.

body.raw:
# Howdy!

I'm the founder of [Tambo](https://tambo.co), building a React SDK for Adaptive AI Interfaces. Previously, I worked on LinkinChat and built products at Indeed, Convoys and Taxbit.

I live in Seattle/San Francisco and spend my free time in nature. Sometimes, against my better judgement, I get the idea to climb volcanoes. Usually, I regret it.
body.code:

body.raw:
## Get in touch

The quickest way to reach me is by messaging me on Twitter at [@mrmagan](https://x.com/mrmagan_). I make a point to respond to every DM I get. I’ve met some incredible people through the internet.
